news.title: Constellation Energy rallies 15% on Meta nuclear power deal
news.summary: Meta has signed a 20-year agreement to buy nuclear power from Constellation Energy. It is the latest in a wave of tech giants teaming up with the industry.

news.title: U.S. growth forecast cut sharply by OECD as Trump tariffs sour global outlook
news.summary: The U.S. economy is now expected to expand by just 1.6% in 2025. The global economy is set to grow by 2.9%.

news.title: Ford reports 16% sales increase in May amid employee pricing, tariffs
news.summary: Ford reported a 16.3% year-over-year sales increase for May. The automaker continues an employee pricing program amid rising tariff costs.

news.title: Alaska Airlines to make Europe debut with Rome flights next year
news.summary: Alaska Airlines is planning to offer flights to Rome. The airline is also planning to launch flights to New York and Los Angeles. Alaska Airlines will also be offering flights to Paris, Madrid and Barcelona.

news.title: Klarna takes on banks with debit card as it diversifies beyond buy now, pay later
news.summary: Swedish fintech has been trying to shift its image from "buy now, pay later" poster child to a more all-encompassing banking player.

news.title: ‘I’m afraid to ask her’: My stepmother won’t show me my father’s will. What now?
news.summary: “She treats my sibling and me as virtual strangers,” she said. “She’s like a stranger to me.”

news.title: What on Earth is going on with the American consumer?
news.summary: U.S. workers are not sure whether to buy that new car — or brace for a recession. U.S.-born workers are the fastest-growing group in the world, according to a new survey.

news.title: OECD reduces U.S. economic-growth forecasts for 2025 and 2026. Again.
news.summary: The Paris-based global policy forum now sees U.S. growth at just 1.6% this year, and global growth at 2.9%.

news.title: Meta’s AI ambitions are sending this nuclear-power stock surging
news.summary: Meta announced a 20-year agreement with Constellation Energy for nuclear power to support its AI development. Tech giant Meta announced an agreement to use nuclear power for 20 years to power its AI research.

news.title: Why it’ll be a sizzling summer for these underdog stocks
news.summary: Evercore strategists say June is traditionally the best month to buy small-cap stocks. Small-caps have had a tough 2025 so far.
